com.radixdlt.client.core.network.jsonrpc

Class RadixJsonRpcClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radixdlt.client.core.network.jsonrpc.RadixJsonRpcClient

  • public class RadixJsonRpcClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for managing the state across one web socket connection to a Radix Node. This consists of mainly keeping track of JSON-RPC method calls and JSON-RPC subscription calls.

      • getAtom

        public io.reactivex.Maybe<Atom> getAtom(EUID hid)
        Queries for an atom by HID. If the node does not carry the atom (e.g. if it does not reside on the same shard) then this method will return an empty Maybe.
        Parameters:
        hid - the hash id of the atom being queried
        Returns:
        the atom if found, if not, return an empty Maybe
